title: Xin Xing | Department of Mathematics
main_content: Xin Xing JOB TITLE: Postdoc RESEARCH AREA: Applied Mathematics RESEARCH INTERESTS: Numerical computations in quantum chemistry, fast algorithms with rank structures Topics Past Postdoc topic page Year Appointed: 2020 Left UC Berkeley: 2023

links.text: Math 32 becomes Math 3; Math 1A becomes Math 51, and Math 1B becomes Math 52
